characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. Initially, a white sedan is parked on the left side of the road. As the vehicle continues, a motorcyclist appears on the left side of the road, moving in the same direction.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while driving on a rural road. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the parked white sedan on the left side and the motorcyclist ahead.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, parked on the roadside. 2) Left side: A motorcyclist, approximately 15 meters away, moving in the same direction.
